articles.description: In 2023, some 57 Indian companies raised around Rs 49,000 crore through mainboard IPOs. And, 27 companies have already obtained the green light from the market regulator to float their public issues to raise around Rs 29,000 crore
articles.content: It's been a dream run on D-Street. As 2023 nears its end, the market rally has not only attracted a record number of retail investors to equities, but also triggered a rush among promoters to take th… [+3221 chars]
